title: Science Instructional Design to Strengthen Multicultural Education Competence (MTC)

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational knowledge in elementary science education and general understanding of multicultural societies
context.additional_context: A program for pre-service teachers and education professionals aiming to integrate multicultural education within science curricula

learning_goals: Learners can design mixed research methods (surveys and interviews) to evaluate multicultural education competencies in science classes
Learners can develop at least three types of instructional materials reflecting multicultural perspectives on science curriculum content
Learners can identify five or more barriers encountered during multicultural education implementation and propose resolution strategies

resources: MTC Inventory (MTCI) and Social Justice Scale (SJS) Item Samples
Online collaboration tools (Google Workspace, Padlet, etc.)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
